passages.text:
Welcome to Ensomme! What brings you to our island community?
[[I'm retired.]] 
[[I'm on vacation!]]
[[I'm just passing through.]]
passages.name: Start

passages.text: Excellent! We have many activities to keep you busy during retirement. [[Fishing festival]]
passages.name: I'm retired.

passages.text: Excellent! This is a great spot to spend a holiday. [[Fishing festival]]
passages.name: I'm on vacation!

passages.text: I see. A wanderer of sorts? [[Fishing festival]]
passages.name: I'm just passing through.

passages.text:
Allow me to introduce myself. I'm Mayor Thompson. You've come at a good time! Today marks the start of our annual fishing festival. 
[[I'm here to fish!|Here to fish]]
[[Fishing festival?|Festival?]]
[[...|Festival 2]]

links.name: I'm here to fish!|Here to fish
links.link: I'm here to fish!|Here to fish

passages.name: Fishing festival

passages.text:
In fact, the ferry you took here will be the last ship coming to port for the next five days!
[[You guys are serious about fishing!|Festival 3]]
[[Do you have enough supplies on the island?|Festival 3]]
[[So you're telling me I'm stuck here for five days?|Festival 3]]

links.name: You guys are serious about fishing!|Festival 3
links.link: You guys are serious about fishing!|Festival 3

links.name: Do you have enough supplies on the island?|Festival 3
links.link: Do you have enough supplies on the island?|Festival 3

links.name: So you're telling me I'm stuck here for five days?|Festival 3
links.link: So you're telling me I'm stuck here for five days?|Festival 3

passages.name: Festival 2

passages.text: Boats disrupt the fish, so we lock down the port during the festival. But don't worry, we have comfortable living arrangements for visitors and we'll have enough fish to satisfy a giant's appetite! [[Festival 4]]
passages.name: Festival 3

passages.text: There's no pressure to participate, but here's a festival badge and a pamphlet about the rules, just in case. I'll just collect the entrance fee now. [[Festival 4.1]]
passages.name: Festival 4

passages.text: [Mayor Thompson took $5. She wouldn't take no for an answer.]
passages.name: Festival 5

passages.text: Take this badge to Anthony by the blue flag in the town square. He'll get you setup with some basic fishing gear. Ready, set, FISH! [[Festival 5]]
passages.name: Festival 4.1

passages.text: Then you've come to the right place... and at the right time! [[Festival 2]]
passages.name: Here to fish

passages.text: That's right, the fishing festival is Ensomme's biggest event of the year. [[Festival 2]]
passages.name: Festival?
